snippet: Nelson Ruiz, 35, billed New York’s Education Department $2.7 million for sign-language interpretation services that the authorities say he never provided.
abstract: Nelson Ruiz of Pennsylvania pleads guilty to defrauding New York City Education Dept of $2.7 million that was intended for children with special needs, billing for sign-language interpretation services he never provided.
lead_paragraph: Nelson Ruiz, 35, billed New York’s Education Department $2.7 million for sign-language interpretation services that the authorities say he never provided.

headline.seo: Man Pleads Guilty to Defrauding Education Department
headline.main: Man Pleads Guilty to Defrauding Education Department
headline.print_headline: Guilty Plea in City Fraud Case
